description:
The ``opc_compute_machine_image`` resource creates and manages a machine image template of a virtual hard disk of a specific size with an installed operating system.

Before performing this creating the Machine Image, you must upload your machine image file to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Object Storage Classic `compute_images` container

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Account.description: The two part name of the compute object storage account in the format `/Compute-{identity_domain}/cloud_storage`.

Attributes.description: An optional JSON object of arbitrary attributes to be made available to the instance. These are user-defined tags. After defining attributes, you can view them from within an instance at http://192.0.0.192/.

Description.description: A description of the Machine Image.

ErrorReason.description: Description of the state of the machine image if there is an error.

File.description: The name of the Machine Image .tar.gz file in the `compute_images` storage container.

Name.description: The name of the Machine Image.

Platform.description: The OS platform of the image.

State.description: The state of the uploaded machine image.

Uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier for the Machine Image.
